html:
burden/yoke. Through the Lord's power, Assyria's burdens will be removed from Israel's shoulders (9:4).

oil. This may refer to the Messiah (Hebrew "anointed one"), who was anointed with olive oil and the Holy Ghost (Acts 10:38). In addition, 10:26-27 contains symbols that represent Jesus the Messiah, including rock, rod, and the removal of the yoke and burden (Matt. 11:28-29).
